response.original_title: Leonard Bernstein: Mass At The BBC Proms
response.overview: A large musical ensemble from across Wales come to the Royal Albert Hall to give the first complete Proms 2012 performance of Leonard Bernstein's Mass, a work that combines religious observance and musical theatre. Kristjan JÃ¤rvi conducts the National Orchestra of Wales, the National Youth Orchestra of Wales and eight choirs of talented children and adult singers, with choruses of street kids and a rock group thrown into the mix. Introduced by Petroc Trelawny.
response.title: Leonard Bernstein: Mass At The BBC Proms
